resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>56566</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020112</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020112</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Une las minúsculas con su nombre</string>
            <string language="en">Match the small letters with their names</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bringen Sie die kleinen Buchstaben mit ihren 
Namen zusammen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Appariez les minuscules avec leurs noms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combine as letras pequenas com seus nomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abbini le lettere minuscole con i loro nomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταιριάξτε με τα μικρά γράμματα τα ονόματά τους</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Es un applet de Java. El alumno debe unir mediante flechas las minúsculas y su nombre. Posee diversos niveles. Cada vez que se abre la actividad cambia el orden de las letras.</string>
            <string language="en">This is a Java applet. The students must match the small Greek letters with their names. There are several levels. When the applet is restarted, the program changes the order of the letters.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">minúsculas</string>
            <string language="en">small letters</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Java applet. Die 
Kursteilnehmer müssen die kleinen griechischen Zeichen mit ihren 
Namen zusammenbringen. Es gibt einige Stufen. Wenn der 
applet wiederbegonnen wird, ändert das Programm die Ordnung der 
Zeichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un Java applet. Les étudiants 
doivent apparier les petites lettres grecques avec leurs noms. 
Il y a plusieurs niveaux. Quand l'applet est relancé, le 
programme change la commande des lettres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um Java applet. Os estudantes devem
combinar as letras gregas pequenas com seus nomes. Há diversos 
níveis. Quando o applet é reiniciado, o programa muda a ordem 
das letras.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un Java applet. Gli allievi devono 
abbinare le piccole lettere greche con i loro nomi. Ci sono 
parecchi livelli. Quando il applet è ricominciato, il programma
cambia l'ordine delle lettere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα applet της Ιάβας. Οι 
σπουδαστές πρέπει να ταιριάξουν με τις μικρές ελληνικές 
επιστολές τα ονόματά τους. Υπάρχουν διάφορα επίπεδα. 
Όταν το applet επανεκκινείται, το πρόγραμμα αλλάζει την 
κατάταξη των επιστολών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kleine Buchstaben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">minuscules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">letras pequenas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettere minuscole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μικρά γράμματα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
